title: 11 - Self-Importance vs. Humility
description:
Are you tired of trying to measure up and matter in life? Self-importance feels so good, it's deep in our bones to crave it and fight for it. We chase it in different ways every day. And it's an exhausting pursuit. Let's see what Scripture says, the power given to us to fight it, and the simple way forward into a whole new way of living.

Download the FREE Get Out of Your Head book club kit: jennieallen.com

Listen to Scripture wherever you go with the Dwell app: https://dwellapp.io/jennie
